Deploying Dropwizard 0.7.x to Heroku

If you've ever deployed an app to Heroku, you know how easy it makes horizontal scaling, and if you've ever used Dropwizard, you know how easy it makes creating and maintaining RESTful services. Combining these two technologies is actually pretty straightforward. With the advent of Dropwizard 0.7.x, there's a class...
